00090                 template <typename CTy, typename CTr = std::char_traits<CTy> >
00091                 class basic_state_saver {
00092 
00093                 public:
00094 
00095                         explicit basic_state_saver(std::basic_ios<CTy,CTr>&);
00096                                         ~basic_state_saver();
00097 
00098                 private:
00099 
00100                         typedef ::std::basic_ios<CTy,CTr>      state_type;
00101                         typedef typename state_type::char_type char_type;
00102                         typedef ::std::ios_base::fmtflags      flags_type;
00103                         typedef ::std::streamsize              streamsize_type;
00104                         typedef ::std::locale const            locale_type;
00105 
00106                         state_type&     state_;
00107                         flags_type      flags_;
00108                         streamsize_type precision_;
00109                         streamsize_type width_;
00110                         char_type       fill_;
00111                         locale_type     locale_;
00112 
00113                         basic_state_saver& operator=(basic_state_saver const&);
00114                 };
